paper_abstract: We classify all self dual and anti self dual quadratic bent functions in 2n variables under the action of the orthogonal group O(2n, F-2). This is done through a classification of all 2nx2n involutory alternating matrices over F2 under the action of the orthogonal group. The sizes of the O(2n, F-2)-orbits of self dual and anti self dual quadratic bent functions are determined explicitly.
paper_title: Classification of self dual quadratic bent functions
